text:
Anupam begins Sense8 season 2

Veteran actor Anupam Kher is delighted to start shooting for the second season of the American science fiction web TV series Sense8 .

The popular series is created, written and executive-produced by Lilly and Lana Wachowski and J. Michael Straczynski.

“Happy to start shooting for Wachowski’s ‘Sense8’ Season 2. It is a joy to be a part of this amazing series,” an elated Anupam tweeted.

The plot of the series is anchored on eight strangers from different parts of the world who suddenly become mentally and emotionally linked.

The actor was a part of the first season of the show, which consisted of 12 episodes. Anupam was seen essaying the character of Sanyam Dandekar, a chef who owns a restaurant. — IANS
title: Anupam Kher starts shooting for Sense8 season two
